Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
flatware \flat"ware`\ n. eating utensils such as knives, forks, and spoons, considered collectively.
Syn: silver. [WordNet 1.5]
flatware n 1: tableware that is relatively flat and fashioned as a single piece 2: silverware eating utensils [syn: {silver}]
